item.description:
Darryl invited you to "Battle Of The Bands" on Friday, August 14 at 8:00pm.

Event: Battle Of The Bands
"Come on down and cheer us on"
What: Performance
Host: Indian Ranch Webster Ma Rt. 16
Start Time: Friday, August 14 at 8:00pm
End Time: Friday, August 14 at 11:00pm
Where: Indian Ranch

Come out and see us compete against 3 other bands for a chance at the finals!!

Darryl is my cousin and according to local Club owners "He is a fantastic Guitarist".

Hope you can all make it - Nancy

There is a $5.00 Cover charge and this will be held inside - so I will be saving tables for us.[/
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a Meet up sign. Plus most of you know me or other members anyway. You will find us!
item.name: Indian Ranch Battle of the Bands
